data.message: Lol trump trump donald duck lol so your shitheads are saying he addresses trump and you are all winging hahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha to funny cunnies this post isnt even about donald duck case your wondering thats what we call trump in australia.its sad that now em is copin savage mouths after speaking up so let me get this stright he was your dawg no hes nothing but a dog wow just fucking wow well im proud that u made a stand babes im glad that you knew people would turn agsinst you but u did it anyway and most of all your finally proving to your fans and the rest of the world that you do care. People have said you rapped about hurting woman blah blah smar i totally  understand you rapped about what u seen through your eyes peole dont understand because 98 percent of them are not musically  talented and love your music because they relate to your lyrics what a scary thought hey . JUST KEEP BEING YOU love it and the new you its about time much love from the land down under xxxxx
